Title: **Business Opportunity**

*French Title*: Opportunité commerciale
*Contract Number*: cb-5376-972793
*Solicitation Number*: ECSZ-RFP-2022-1880

## Business Opportunity Summary

Elections Canada is inviting Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement holders to submit a proposal for an Employment Systems Review (ESR) for the Office of the Chief Electoral Officer (OCEO), including Elections Canada, the Commissioner of Canada Elections, Election Administrators, Election Officers and Office Staff. The contract duration is expected to be one year with the option to extend for up to another year.

### Key Description

* **Estimated Contract Value**: Bidder may submit a bid for one or all resource categories, each with an estimated duration of 220 days.
* **Number of Contracts Awarded**: Up to 1 contract.
* **Category**: Human Resources Consulting Services.

**Note:** Bidders are required to refer to the complete Request for Proposal (RFP) document for a full description of the requirement and the full bid instructions.

### Background

* The Employment Equity Act (the Act) and its Regulations require that employers perform an in-depth assessment of their workforce, and conduct a review of their employment systems, policies and practices where under-representation of persons in designated groups is identified.
* Elections Canada has not conducted a comprehensive ESR since 2015.

### Requirement

* Services required to perform an ESR for Elections Canada and related entities.
* Review will assess employment systems, policies, and practices to identify any barriers to persons in designated groups.
* ESR will aid in determining the root causes of underrepresentation and gaps in all employment systems.

#### Security Requirements

* Minimum corporate security required: Department of Supply: Reliability
* Minimum resource security required: Reliability status

### Submission of Proposals

* Proposal documents must be submitted in either English or French Language.
* Proposals must be addressed to the Contracting Authority and delivered, sealed, to the Proposal Receiving Unit no later than May 30, 2023 (2023-05-30T14:00:00).
* Bids sent via email or facsimile will not be accepted.

### Enquiries

* All enquiries and other communications with Elections Canada personnel are to be directed ONLY to the Contracting Authority.
* Enquiries must be submitted in writing and no later than the deadline indicated in the RFP.

**Contact Information:**

* Svetlana Zely
